detailsData.title: Experienced Team
detailsData.content: Larry Pitt & Associates has over 42 years of experience serving injured workers in Pennsylvania, providing a wealth of knowledge and expertise in workers' compensation, personal injury, and Social Security Disability claims.

detailsData.title: Personalized Service
detailsData.content: The firm prides itself on offering personalized service, ensuring that clients receive the attention and care they need during their legal process.

detailsData.title: Comprehensive Support
detailsData.content: From initial consultation to securing benefits or settlements, Larry Pitt & Associates guides clients through every step, offering support, advice, and representation.

detailsData.title: Proven Success
detailsData.content: With a track record of recovering millions for injured workers, the firm demonstrates its commitment to fighting for clients' rights and securing the compensation they deserve.

subHeading: 42+ Years of Serving Injured Workers in Pennsylvania
valueProp: Welcome to Larry Pitt & Associates, a dedicated group of lawyers who deal in workers’ comp, Social Security Disability and personal injury claims in Berks County, Bucks County, Delaware County, Chester County, Montgomery County, and Philadelphia County, Pennsylvania. Over the last 40 years, we have handled thousands of cases and helped thousands of people obtain the workers’ compensation and Social Security Disability benefits they need and deserve. Our commitment to protecting the rights of injured workers has made us a leader in Philadelphia among Social Security Disability and workers’ compensation attorneys.

testimonalData.text: One of the BEST Workman's Comp Lawyers in Philadelphia. Guided me every step of the way, with the positive and negatives that could happen in my case. So happy I stuck with Larry Pitt & Associates.
testimonalData.author: Melinda M.

testimonalData.text: Answered or returned calls and emails in a timely fashion. The employees at this firm are working for us the employee, not the employers. Very professional.
testimonalData.author: Anna D.

testimonalData.text: Pitt is one super-talented guy. Sharp as a tack, straight-forward, easy to talk to, and a bulldog of a negotiator. Changing attorneys in the middle of my case was a tough decision to make, but as soon as I took the leap, Pitt started moving my case forward. The only problem is, now that my case is settled, I'm going to miss visiting Pitt and his friendly staff of go-getters.
testimonalData.author: Tom T.
